# Testing



## PREPARE

**Test use swcdb_cluster**
- swcdb_cluster needs setup [as by instructiuons](/swc-db/install/swcdb_cluster/)



## RUN THE TEST
*  while at builds [path as by instructions](/swc-db/build/prerequisites/)

```bash
cd swcdb;
```

```bash
make test;
```
